text:
Hello everyone! I'm Mike Lane.  I am a programmer and analyst from Fulton County Government Office of Strategic Planning located in beautiful Atlanta, Georgia.  I have been one of the 6 maintainers of Fulton County's internal R-package that automatically updates the county's Open Data Platform and API: <https://data.fultoncountyga.gov/>
The county primarily uses RSelenium, Rshiny, Tableau, Socrata, tidyverse, tidymodels, googleanalyticsR, Microsoft365R.  I am open for any collaborating, sharing, and bug reports.
